Detailed Description

TREX goal definition.

This file provides interfaces and utilities to create and manipulate goals exchanged between reactors.

Deprecated:
the current implementation of goals is not as flexible and transparent as desired and may change drastically in the future
Author:
Frederic Py <fpy@mbari.org>
